summary: UnHung Hero charts a humiliated man's fact-finding journey as he consults porn stars, doctors and anthropologists to learn whether the size of one's manhood matters.
cast: Patrick Moote|Wendy Suzann Miller|Axel Braun|Jonah Falcon|Allie Haze|Keith Hodge|Kevin Hodge|Robert Lawrence|Carol Queen|Dan Savage|Annie Sprinkle|James Tracy|Cristian YoungMiller
title: UnHung Hero
